ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. A. David MacAdam ** RETIREMENT AND ANNUITY **
PrecisRetirement and granting of an ANNUITY to the Hon. A. DAVID MACADAM, a Judge of the Supreme Court of Nova Scotia, effective January 2, 2016.
AttachmentsAttachment
